dataQuality.title: Data Quality Notice

dataQuality.high: Excellent data quality. Recommendations are highly personalized.
dataQuality.excellent: Outstanding data quality. Recommendations are very precise!
dataQuality.suggestion: Continue recording data to improve recommendation accuracy
